role.descr: Bracketed to, together with what? NOT instrument, other stuff in bracket

example.name: Age brackets
example.text: Because the didn't have enough young boys for two full teams, they bracketed the seven-year olds with the eight-year olds.

example.name: With Arg 3 instrument
